entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:36 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:36 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:36 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
